name: Introspection
description: Focus your body and mind into a meditative state, healing for 1800 Health and restoring 1500 Magicka and Stamina every 1 second.  Maintaining the channel increases the Health restored by 10% every tick, up to a maximum of 50%.  You will remain in a meditative state until you toggle this ability off or are interrupted.
effectLines: Maintaining the channel increases the amount of Health restored.
rawDescription:
Focus your body and mind into a meditative state, healing for <<1>> Health and restoring <<2>> Magicka and Stamina every <<3>>.

Maintaining the channel increases the Health restored by <<4>> every tick, up to a maximum of |cffffff50|r%.

You will remain in a meditative state until you toggle this ability off or are interrupted.
